tool_description: Analyzes planetary motion over time to determine retrograde periods and calculates apparent motion speeds for celestial bodies.

start_julian_day.description: Starting Julian Day for analysis period

end_julian_day.description: Ending Julian Day for analysis period

error_messages: Invalid planet name: Use Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, or Pluto
Invalid date range: End Julian day must be greater than start Julian day
Date range too large: Maximum analysis period is 3650 days (10 years)
Invalid sampling interval: Must be between 1 and 30 days
usage: Provide planet name and Julian day range for analysis. Optionally set sampling interval. Returns retrograde status and motion characteristics.

is_retrograde_start.description: Whether planet is retrograde at start of period

is_retrograde_end.description: Whether planet is retrograde at end of period

retrograde_periods.description: Array of date ranges when planet is retrograde

average_daily_motion.description: Average daily motion in degrees per day
